description:
An application that shows you the time &  weather at a glance and blends in with your background, to appear almost invisible on your background.   The weather and clock can be hidden if not needed and you have a clear card to keep your homescreen uncluttered when you have other apps open.  You can also hide the clock OR weather move them higher or lower if they block the center of your homescreen wallpaper.     
                                                      
Update: Version 0.1.1 fixes icon issues.
  
Update: Version 0.0.8, added ability for full screen.
